serverController

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConnectionManager

        public ConnectionManager(ServerSocket serverSocket,
                         GameManager gameMan,
                         PlayerManager playMan)
        The ConnectionManager has as job to manage all socket connections. It also enables socket connection management by being able to remove or add connections. The connectionmanager has acces to the instances of gameMan and playMan
        Parameters:
        port - integer number of the port to open the socket listner service on.

    • Method Detail

      • addNewClient

        public void addNewClient(Socket skt)
                  throws IOException
        This method adds a new client to the list and gives it an unique Id The client is then assigned an ConnectionToServerObj in it's own thread.
        Parameters:
        skt - the .accept() 'ed socket
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getClientById

        public Optional<ConnectedClientObj> getClientById(int findThisClientId)
        This method searches the clients list for a client object matching the provided id.
        Parameters:
        findThisClientId - The clientId you wish to obtain an object for.
        Returns:
        Optional

      • removeClientById

        public void removeClientById(int findThisId)
        This method searches the clients list for a client object matching the provided id. Then it will delete: - Quit the game the player is in - Remove the client - Clear the request queue from the clientId - remove the associated player with the clientId.
        Parameters:
        findThisClientId - The clientId you wish to obtain an object for.

      • getLatestClientId

        public int getLatestClientId()

        public List<ConnectedClientObj> getClients()

      • addToClientTxQueue

        public void addToClientTxQueue(ToClientPacket toClientPacket)

      • transmitAllToClientQueue

        public void transmitAllToClientQueue()
        Transmission flush trigger. Pulls the enqueued messages from the global queue, saves them internally and sorts FiFo. Then the message is sent to clients using transmitToClient
        Parameters:
        -
        See Also:
        transmitToClient

      • transmitToClient

        public void transmitToClient(int clientIdtarget,
                             String msg)
        Transmission trigger of a message. Will trigger the socket output to the client to flush the inputted string.
        Parameters:
        clientIdtarget - The clientId of the target
        msg - The message string to deliver to the client.
        See Also:
        transmitAllToClientQueue
